attributes.action: provide information and training for General Practitioners about eating disorders and treatments for them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Guidance from the National Institute for Clinical Excellence states that early detection of an eating disorder will reduce the severity and duration of it. These are serious mental illnesses that have the highest mortality rate of any mental illness and affect 1.6 million people in the UK.

Increasing awareness and knowledge of eating disorders in primary care will mean people will suffer less from their eating disorder, with fewer people requiring intensive, long-term treatments that are both distressing for sufferers and their families, and expensive for the NHS.
